languages.text: "Разве можно рассказать хорошую байку о легкой битве? Нет уж! Зададим им жару, Лорд-капитан".
"If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Разве можно рассказать хорошую байку о легкой битве? Нет уж! Зададим им жару, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."
"If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."
"If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."
"If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."
"If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."

languages.text: “如果这是场简简单单的战斗，那还有谁会费神讲它的故事呢？根本没人会讲，是吧！好了，让他们见识见识你的厉害吧，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “如果这是场简简单单的战斗，那还有谁会费神讲它的故事呢？根本没人会讲，是吧！好了，让他们见识见识你的厉害吧，舰长大人。”

languages.text: "Wäre es eine leichte Schlacht, wer würde dann jemals Geschichten davon erzählen? Niemand! Zeigen wir es ihnen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Wäre es eine leichte Schlacht, wer würde dann jemals Geschichten davon erzählen? Niemand! Zeigen wir es ihnen, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Si le combat était trop facile, qui prendrait la peine de le raconter, hein ? Personne ! Alors il faut leur montrer de quel bois on se chauffe, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Si le combat était trop facile, qui prendrait la peine de le raconter, hein ? Personne ! Alors il faut leur montrer de quel bois on se chauffe, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «Si la batalla fuera una bicoca, ¿quién se molestaría en hablar de ella? ¡Exacto, nadie! Démosles una lección, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Si la batalla fuera una bicoca, ¿quién se molestaría en hablar de ella? ¡Exacto, nadie! Démosles una lección, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「簡単に片付いた戦いについて語ろうとする人とかいる？誰もない、そうでしょ！見せつけてやりましょう、ロード・キャプテン！」
languages.original_text: "If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「簡単に片付いた戦いについて語ろうとする人とかいる？誰もない、そうでしょ！見せつけてやりましょう、ロード・キャプテン！」

languages.text: "Kolay bir savaş olsaydı kim oturup hakkında hikâyeler anlatırdı ki? Hiç kimse! Onlara günlerini gösterelim Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "If it were an easy battle, who would ever bother to tell tales about it? Nobody, that's who! Let's show 'em, Lord Captain."
